content.html: If you’re neurodivergent and in therapy, one of the best things you can do for yourself is to find a professional who is ND themselves or at very least neurodiversity-affirming. It is genuinely life changing talking to someone who just gets it without gaslighting you 24x7.
content.value:
If you’re neurodivergent and in therapy, one of the best things you can do for yourself is to find a professional who is ND themselves or at very least neurodiversity-affirming. 

It is genuinely life changing talking to someone who just gets it without gaslighting you 24x7.
